channel.title: Single Combat Zone Error, Need Help
channel.description:
If Your Reading This Delta, U Helped Make The Tut i Used,
On My Server (Project Czar Base) I Added Edge As 1 V 1, But.. When Someone Attacks, The start Hitting, The person They Attack Cant Hit Back, And No1 Else Can Interfere,
Help Much Appreciated

item.title: Single Combat Zone Error, Need Help
item.dc:creator: @Java_Is_My_Bitch Java Is My Bitch™
item.description:
@Java_Is_My_Bitch wrote:

I think:

plz.underAttack = true;

Comment that out:

//

I’m sorry, but that code if a peice of shit no offense to made it, it’s too messy. I can hardly understand it. I get how he made it 1 vs 1, just because of the logout delay, but some servers don’t have a logout delay of 5, i have 1, and for some servers it doesn’t even work, it works for a select few.

I suggest you make one, thats better than that.

Look at this shit!

if(nonWild() && singleCombat() == false || AttackingOn2.nonWild() && singleCombat() == false) {

Gayest way to do it!

if(nonWild || AttackingOn2.nonWild() && singleCombat() == false) {

Is a better way.

If its nonwildy or the player that he is attacking is nonwildy and single combat is false.

Read full topic

if(underAttack == true && plz.underAttack == false) { sendMessage("You are already under attack"); }

item.source: Single Combat Zone Error, Need Help

item.title: Single Combat Zone Error, Need Help
item.dc:creator: @hallowed_soul hallowed soul
item.description:
@hallowed_soul wrote:

case 73: //Attack (Wilderness) if(inCombat2()) { underAttack = false; } if(PkingDelay <= 1) { AttackingOn = inStream.readSignedWordBigEndian(); client plz = (client) server.playerHandler.players[AttackingOn]; if(singleCombat() && underAttack == false && plz.underAttack == false && plz.singleCombat() && plz != null) { IsAttacking = true; inCombat(); plz.inCombat(); underAttack = true; plz.underAttack = true; if (GoodDistance(absX, absY, EnemyX, EnemyY, 1) == true) { setAnimation(GetWepAnim()); } else { } if(server.playerHandler.players[AttackingOn] != null) { if(server.playerHandler.players[AttackingOn].absX != absX && server.playerHandler.players[AttackingOn].absY != absY) viewTo(server.playerHandler.players[AttackingOn].absX, server.playerHandler.players[AttackingOn].absY); faceNPC = 32768+AttackingOn; faceNPCupdate = true; } } if(!singleCombat()) { underAttack = false; } if(underAttack == true && plz.underAttack == false) { sendMessage("You are already under attack"); } if(underAttack == false && plz.underAttack == true) { sendMessage("You Want To Team? Go To Team Wars, At ::minigames"); } if(!singleCombat() && !nonWild() && !plz.nonWild() && plz != null) { IsAttacking = true; inCombat(); plz.inCombat(); plz.underAttack = false; underAttack = false; if (GoodDistance(absX, absY, EnemyX, EnemyY, 1) == true) { setAnimation(GetWepAnim()); } else { } if(server.playerHandler.players[AttackingOn] != null) { if(server.playerHandler.players[AttackingOn].absX != absX && server.playerHandler.players[AttackingOn].absY != absY) viewTo(server.playerHandler.players[AttackingOn].absX, server.playerHandler.players[AttackingOn].absY); faceNPC = 32768+AttackingOn; faceNPCupdate = true; } } } break;

Thats My Current Case 73, What Needs Changing, It Looks Right To Me

Read full topic
